source_objects.description: Break into new industries from healthcare, to veterinary medicine or event planning.
source_objects.title: Industry

items.title: Understanding HIPAA for the Medical Office
items.headline: A healthcare professional's guide to understanding the requirements HIPAA
objectives_summary: An understanding of the reasons for the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996
Recongnition of the scope of the HIPAA law for both health care and insurance industries
To be able to describe the types of healh care providers that are "covered entities"

items.title: How to Read P&ID, PFD & BFD used in Process Plant like Pro
items.headline: Learn How to Read Piping and Instrument Diagram-P&ID, Process Flow Diagram and Block Flow Diagram used in Process Plant
objectives_summary: You can read and understand P&ID / PEFS - Piping and Instrumentation Diagram / Process Engineering Flow Scheme
You can read and understand PFD / PFS - Process Flow Diagram / Process Flow Scheme
You can read and understand BFD - Block Flow Diagram

items.title: Autonomous Cars: How Do They Work and Impact Us?
items.headline: Everything You Need to Know About Autonomous Driving / Self-driving / Driverless / Robot Cars. Functionality To Impact.
objectives_summary: Estimate costs of future mobility options.
See challenges from a development perspective.
Explain how autonomous cars perceive and think.

items.title: Basic Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP)

visible_instructors.title: Ruben Alonso
visible_instructors.job_title: Auditor de Calidad en Industria Farmacéutica
visible_instructors.name: Ruben

items.headline: Learn the good practices that applies to the pharmaceutical industry
objectives_summary: You will learn the most important pharmaceutical regulation and its importance, obtaining a basic overview of the GMP requirements in pharmaceutical industry
You will become familiar with the technical terms of the GMP field and their meaning.
You will learn the fundamental parts of the pharmaceutical industry.

items.title: Flow of fluids through piping systems , valves and pumps
items.headline: Learn to size valves & piping systems, calculate pressure drop, flow of liquids & gases through pipe , fittings & valves
objectives_summary: Understand the main physical properties of fluids (viscosity, vapor pressure, specific gravity, weight density...)
Understand the theory of flow in pipe : Laminar vs Turbulent flow
Understand and learn how to use the Bernoulli Theorem for pressure drop, head loss or flow velocity assessment

items.title: Getting Started as a Wedding and Event Planner
items.headline: Getting experience, building a portfolio, types of services offered, mistakes to avoid and much more!
objectives_summary: Students will have a clear understanding of what wedding and event planners do
Learn the types of services and add-on services typically offered by wedding and event planners
Understand the general price options and salary ranges for wedding and event planners

items.title: Know Read Understand Piping & Instrumentation Diagrams P&IDs
items.headline: Learn how Process Control, Safety Instrumented Systems, Interlock & Alarms are represented in engineering P&ID drawings
objectives_summary: Understand and evaluate the purpose, content, and importance of P&IDs to the construction, commissionning, safe operation and maintenance of a process plant
Learn how to read, interpret and successfully understand ALL P&IDs through numerous real industrial examples
Identify the 5 key sections of your P&ID (title block, grid system, revision block, notes and legend, engineering drawing block)

items.title: Consulting Startup How to Start a Consulting Business Fast

visible_instructors.title: Louise Anne Maurice
visible_instructors.name: Louise Anne
visible_instructors.job_title: Empowered Coaching Approach™ Training World-Class Coaches

items.headline: Consulting Business Startup Plan Simplified You Learn the Exact 90 Steps and 5 Phases to Startup a Consulting Business
objectives_summary: ✅September 2021 Course Updated to Help you Rise above the Competition and Empower You to Fearlessly Startup Your Consulting Business Using Proven Methods.
✅Startup Your Consulting Business with Exact 90 Step Plan Saving You Time and Money to Confidently Build and Grow Your Consulting Business the Right Way.
✅Startup Your Consulting Business 5 Phase Step-By-Step Business Plan Including Pricing and B2B or B2C Consulting Services Marketing Plan to Start Using Today.

items.title: Broker U - Gateway to Becoming a Freight Broker

visible_instructors.title: Roger Garza
visible_instructors.job_title: Author of Gateway to Becoming a Freight Broker
visible_instructors.name: Roger

items.headline: Online Freight Broker Training - Learn the skills necessary to become a Freight Broker or agent.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course students will be able to obtain an operating authority, find their own customers, and dispatch freight.

items.title: The Simplest Guide to Clinical Trials Data Analysis with SAS

visible_instructors.title: Aslam Khan
visible_instructors.job_title: M.S., PMP, SAS Base and Adv. certified
visible_instructors.name: Aslam

items.headline: Step into the world of Pharmaceutical industry |Clinical Trials |Clinical Research |Biostatistics |Data Management| SAS
objectives_summary: Get introduced to the Life Science/ Pharmaceutical industry in simple, visual pictures
Learn the fundamental concepts of Clinical Drug Development / Clinical Trials processes
Understand the various Phases of Clinical Trials in the context of SAS programming

items.title: How to be an Expert in Piping Valves for Your Career Success
items.headline: Learn about valve used in Oil & Gas Piping,18 types of valve, Std & Spec.,Manufacturing, Materials,Inspection & Testing.
objectives_summary: Learn about more than 18 types of piping valves
Know about different types components of valves
Proper selection & classification of valve

items.title: Multi-objective Optimization Problems and Algorithms
items.headline: How to handle multiple objectives using a wide range of optimization algorithms
objectives_summary: Able to solve multi-objective problems
Able to use multi-objective optimization algorithms
Visualize the results of a multi-objective optimization

items.title: Actors: Learn How To Audition For Film And Television
items.headline: Veteran Casting Director MARCI LIROFF tells you what you need to book the job in your audition. This is a MUST HAVE!
objectives_summary: In this course, you will learn:
In this course, you will gain the tools needed to shine bright on auditions, which can land you an acting job in film or television.
What you should be doing before (prep), during, and after your audition

items.title: Hotel Management Fundamentals - Hotel Management Operations
items.headline: Learn hotel management basics, dive into hotel operations, succeed in your hotel management career and become a manager
objectives_summary: Hotel Management Structure
Departmental Operations
Professional Hotel Terminology

items.headline: Learn the basics of EPLAN - essential functions and sections - the right way
objectives_summary: Project - create, copy, delete, rename, backup, restore
Pages - type, number, structures
Structure in EPLAN - how it works and why we need to understand it

items.title: Public Speaking for Engineers: Never Get Lost in Tech Detail
items.headline: Public Speaking: present technical information in an understandable and memorable way, even to non-engineering audiences
objectives_summary: Deliver technical presentations effectively
Use PowerPoint without boring your audience
Speak without getting lost in the details
